rows.label: qst200214_msg0001
rows.name:
You're Tuvarri, right?
Jaruru told us about you.

rows.label: qst200214_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, Jaruru sent you?
Perfect timing.

rows.label: qst200214_msg0003
rows.name:
I was just running into a bit of a snag.
We don't have enough cargo - could
you go and fetch some more for me?

rows.label: qst200214_msg0004
rows.name:
Excuse me?! I would never collude
in illegal smuggl-

rows.label: qst200214_msg0005
rows.name:
Shh! Shhhhhh!
Hang on a moment, Glen!

rows.label: qst200214_msg0006
rows.name:
What is the matter, Nia?
I was just about to set this man
on the straight and...

rows.label: qst200214_msg0007
rows.name:
Look, Glen. We don't even know
if this guy knows about the smuggling
yet, do we? He could be innocent!

rows.label: qst200214_msg0009
rows.name:
Jaruru said the herbs would be hidden
in regular cargo, right? Let's play dumb
for now and see where he takes them.

rows.label: qst200214_msg0010
rows.name:
Urghhh... I suppose that does
follow a certain logic...

rows.label: qst200214_msg0011
rows.name:
You can count on us to pick up the
cargo, Mr. Tuvarri. What exactly do
you need us to fetch?

rows.label: qst200214_msg0012
rows.name:
Let's see... We're missing two Divine Beastic
Craniums, and five Ancient Chalices.

rows.label: qst200214_msg0013
rows.name:
If you don't have any handy, you
should be able to find them by
salvaging. But make it quick!

rows.label: qst200214_msg0014
rows.name:
Guaaaaarghhhhh!
This doesn't sit right with me at all!!!

rows.label: qst200214_msg0015
rows.name:
Wh-what the hell?!
Is this guy all right, shouting out
all of a sudden like that?!

rows.label: qst200214_msg0016
rows.name:
Don't worry, it's nothing!
We'll be right back!
